website_summaries.verdict: A very basic hose nozzle for individuals who are on a budget.
pros: This hose nozzle features a simple design and functions with a twist action like a classic model
The greatest appeal is the low price
cons: This is not a brass nozzle, it is a brass-colored aluminum nozzle

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Read description! Title is a lie! Not brass! What's worse is that it has less pressure than a gilmour pistol grip sprayer I purchaced for the same price.... I read descriptions and new what was coming, however it feels so light and flimsy I thought it may actually be made of plastic and the hole is not narrow enough to build up any more pressure than a plain pistol grip sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Title - Says "Brass Metal" but it should say "Brass colored aluminum"
customer_reviews.text: This is pure deception in marketing. The title says "Brass metal". How easy would it have been for them to write "Brass-colored aluminum" and avoided all the confusion by other reviewers here? The fact that they only write "brass colored" in the fine print tells me they were intentionally trying to mislead people into thinking this was made of brass, otherwise they simply would have said "Aluminum". Aluminum is horrible when it fuses to real brass hose ends so this nozzle is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Osmo

customer_reviews.title: JUST DONT GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT THE FIREMAN HOSE STYLE FROM THE 50s. I had a very old 1950s heavy duty brass and it had a VERY intense water stream. This is NOT IT! The hole is just too big to concentrate the water.
customer_reviews.author: ravepurpledust

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT BRASS AND NOT WHAT IS PICTURED!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT BRASS!!!! Maybe it's just me but when something says "Brass" in the title description, it should be made of brass. And, what I got is not what is in the picture. Should I have read all the fine print? Maybe. But when you're in a hurry and don't have time, you get burned. Should they have replaced the word brass in the title description with whatever the hell this thing is made of? Absolutely. Nice bait and switch, jerks.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Not much bigger than a thimble
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! You can’t turn it off or change water spray. Not much bigger than a thimble.
customer_reviews.author: Shorton25

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making these.
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to find, so I am happy to have found one. It's simple and does the job of creating a nice jet of water. We had one with an on/off lever before and lost it. I only wish this one has an on/off lever. I will see if I can find an on/off accessory attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute cheap toy like quality
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely cheap low quality brass plastic it busted after being dropped once on the concrete from two feet off the ground. I have a solid brass one that’s endured hundreds of drops and been run over a few times. This is cheap garbage from China.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: nice brass hose attachment
customer_reviews.text: this nozzle is durable and great for watering the flowers or washing the truck use with stream stopper and you won't waste water and you can reach wherever you need to
customer_reviews.author: pkkmmokelly

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.text: RIP OFF! Read description title is misleading. Title reads “Brass Metal Sweeper Nozzle” however if you go to the description it basically tells you the title description is a lie. It describes it as Brass Colored Aluminum nozzle not the Brass Metal Sweeper Nozzle that the title states. This item is a rip off and not worth the $6.07 they are asking. I guess it is not false advertising since the description states what it is, however this is a thin line on being false advertising as far as I am concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Produces a strong jet or water.
customer_reviews.text: Great for clearing clogs in house plumbing lines. It's also good for cleaning muddy vehicles or cleaning the driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Rod K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRASS - deceptive description!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a nozzle made of durable, non-corrosion metal - a.k.a. BASS! I would send this P.O.S. back but it really is not worth my time to do so. To say the thing is made of “Brass metal” is totally dishonest and should not be allowed. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Pederson

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny.
customer_reviews.text: Weighing in at a respectable 12 grams (equal to that of not one, but TWO cinnamon disc candies), the Melnor 4125SH Brass Metal Sweeper Nozzle is shinier and much lighter than its heavier and not-so-shiny solid brass counterpart. I hope it lasts as long as the candy.
customer_reviews.author: GrouchyOldMan

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. Not sure what it's made of, it looks like it's plastic coated with a bronze looking finish.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and I was able to complete the task I needed this for with no trouble at all
customer_reviews.author: SAUL SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: Not a very "brassy" brass, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this works as advertised but it is very light weight for a solid brass nozzle. It felts as if it is more aluminum than brass, and the brass color is not very "brassy". I suspect it is more of a mystery metal alloy than what would more properly be classified as brass. For the price, I am satisfied, but wish the nozzle was a bit smaller to provide a more powerful stream.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dal-Ben

customer_reviews.title: for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I can use water to clean and for me it has done its job well.
customer_reviews.author: agsb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap but works OK.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy construction. Definitely much thinner material than what I was used to buying at the home improvement stores. Nonetheless it worked ok. Just don't drop it because it will easily bend or break. For a cheap disposable hose nozzle it's just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Too light weight. Not too durable. Note it is not an adjustable sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Treaty

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRASS! DONT FALL FOR IT!
customer_reviews.text: Brass Metal? This is lightweight aluminum that has a brass colored coating! Shame on you for misrepresenting this item! Shame on me for falling for it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRASS. Cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: NOT BRASS. I should’ve read more of the reviews. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It isn't solid brass
customer_reviews.text: I think it's made of aluminum I think. Brass plated?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very light and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very light and durable nozzle. It scuffs easy, but retains function without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Averbukh

customer_reviews.title: Quick...easy...effective
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to find and they work so well....quick...easy...effective
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made overpriced JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap junk. Made to look like brass but it’s cheap thin thin thin aluminum. A sturdy plastic nozzle would be better. I would not buy this for 5 cents at a hardware store where I have the opportunity to examine it. Shame on you Melnor for marketing this cheaply made junk.
customer_reviews.author: Woody L.

customer_reviews.title: It's plastic.
customer_reviews.text: .looks like brass but is plastic, never says it is plastic! I thought it was brass.
customer_reviews.author: MOSanDiego

customer_reviews.title: I think brass color sweeper nozzle would be a more apt description
customer_reviews.text: I found my lost brass nozzle after ordering this one. The old brass nozzle looks much the same and weighs 45 grams. This one weighs 12 grams. I think it is probably brass colored or plated aluminum or something. I think it will work fine if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive unit, but a bit lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a bit more heavy duty. I guess you get what you pay for. Still, not a bad unit. Sprays good and even. Seals well. Comes with washer gasket. Next time, I'll buy a thicker walled one. I tend to easily ruin things and prefer heavy duty. Until I run this one over, I'll use it and enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit58Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk not real brass do not buy
customer_reviews.text: junk not real brass a cheap piece of plastic Melnor has their nerve manufacturing a piece of junk like this.
customer_reviews.author: charles  babigian

customer_reviews.title: This product is not Brass
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a brass nosel that is as durable as brass this is not it. Possibily another aloy. Was also tricked by this add. Probably cost 5 cents to make and more to ship.
customer_reviews.author: GTR

customer_reviews.title: Solid, useful.
customer_reviews.text: I don't suppose there is much you could do with a hunk of brass to mess things up. This nozzle is well built, has a good finish and is very useful when you need a strong, steady stream to wash down trailers, hose off a walk or whatever. I would suggest that you also get a hose shutoff like the Melnor 9001 Brass Shut-off so you don't need to run back to the faucet as you are working.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pope

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality junk
customer_reviews.text: Broke in half first time I used it. Don’t buy this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly Flimsy Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Utterly disappointed by this nozzle. I have been looking for one of these style nozzles locally for a while now. Bought and received this one. It's an EXTRAORDINARILY lightweight product -- and I mean seriously thin. (I'm trying to find a replacement for a 20-yr old version that was heavy, strong and lasted forever.) While the jet was good, the nozzle broke literally the first time I dropped the hose. It's not a solid piece. Turns out the nozzle is brazed into the threaded base... badly brazed into the base. Good luck to you. Don't drop that hose.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Plastic -  brass colored plastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is junk which you would expect for the price but if it had been made of brass like it says it would be fine. This is fraud!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Carter, DVM

customer_reviews.title: Just Brass Colored
customer_reviews.text: The title says "Brass Metal", it is just "Brass coated". I guess I should have read past the title. They are good for now but will not last like a solid brass nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Karnel Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Not brass as stated in the title, garbage...
customer_reviews.text: This is not brass as stated as advertised, cheap, crap aluminum...
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: It sprays out many gallons of Water very fast the hole diameter could be a little smaller and It will still require high pressure high volume of Water, Its Not very efficient and You have to get very close to get the maximum power from the jet stream, other than that It works good and It will last almost forever.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap...
customer_reviews.text: Thinly walled. Very lightweight compared to the ones I get from Lowe's. It works but it looks like it won't stand up to a car tire running over it like the others I have. Can't complain about the price but I expected a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richer

customer_reviews.title: Not Brass
customer_reviews.text: This is aluminum electrolized with somethign brass colored. Very Very lightweight. May not even be aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: F5711

customer_reviews.title: Not Brass Metal
customer_reviews.text: The product title says "Brass metal" but it is NOT brass. Looks like plastic. Why does Amazon allow junk?
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It's not brass
customer_reviews.text: This piece is not "Brass" only in the fine print it then says "Aluminum" after headlining it as "Brass"
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey HH Roth

customer_reviews.title: This is described as a brass nozzle, in reality you get a cheap brass colored aluminum nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: I would not have bought this nozzle had I known it was aluminum!
customer_reviews.author: David Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Hose adapter
customer_reviews.text: This item is NOT brass, infact I am not even sure its metal. I'm thinking plastic...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miss Labled in description it is not brass as stated it is actually gold colored plastic
customer_reviews.text: i would have liked to have know product was plastic and not brass like advertised
customer_reviews.author: Rick Ledford

customer_reviews.title: Gods quality, priced well
customer_reviews.text: These were less expensive then some all those I saw at Amazon, however, they are top-quality and not cheaply made. it is a medium to heavy weight brass.
customer_reviews.author: Frank V. Cassarino Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's like plastic
customer_reviews.text: Product is like made out of plastic. Amazon should not promote this product.
customer_reviews.author: AMRAT PATEL

customer_reviews.title: read carefully. Not made of brass
customer_reviews.text: Very light. NOT made of brass. It's only brass colored.
customer_reviews.author: Just passing through

customer_reviews.title: my new vaf toy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost everyday.. love to power wash the cars, patio furniture, walkways...So easy. I get power power to the spray, so much that if I do not pay attention, I cut lines in the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Light in weight but it works
customer_reviews.text: More afforidable sweeter nozzle. Works fine. Light in weight but it works.
customer_reviews.author: SODA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent interaction, quickly shipped
customer_reviews.text: Excellent interaction, quickly shipped. The nozzles are aluminum cast with brass plating. Lightweight and work great, just don't go dragging it along a hard rough surface, which will quickly rough it up.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I had a fantastic heavy brass nozzle with a smaller opening (greater venturi force) before and someone swiped it. So I got this one and it is nowhere near as good as the old one. It's very thin brass -- I thought it was plastic at first and still am not quite sure -- and the spray is too wide for the kind of force I need. The thief must have known the old kind are hard to find anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: For quick gardening jobs use Melnor brass nozles.
customer_reviews.text: This sweeper nozzle has the best design to deliver enough water pressure to do great watering and clean up job at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen hurley

customer_reviews.title: It is not brass!
customer_reviews.text: This nozzle works fine, but is is not brass - so the description is not correct. It is very light, and if you scrape the surface with a knife, you can see the real material underneath the brass paint.
customer_reviews.author: MiWilder

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it a gain
customer_reviews.text: I like it it gave me a little more pressure
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: old school style
customer_reviews.text: Love to blast the dirt off your patio? This is it. Good ole fashion pressure washing with out the pressure washer
customer_reviews.author: macampos50

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic?
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT brass. It is brass-looking PLASTIC or some lightweight mystery metal painted gold. What a misrepresentation. I'd send it back but it would cost more to send back than it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Melnor 4125SH Brass Metal Sweeper Nozzle
product_meta.description:
Cleaning paved surfaces or decks is a breeze with a sweeper nozzle. The simple design creates a wide blast of water that clears away dirt & leaves. This classic hose-end tool will last for years to come.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Durable brass; concentrated flow for a sweeping action. Great for sweeping driveways and walks.
feature_bullets: The simple design creates a wide blast of water that clears away dirt and leaves
This classic hose-end tool will last for years to come
This product is manufactured in China
Concentrated flow for a sweeping action
Great for sweeping driveways and walks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars239 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
